name: Qwil, Inc.
description: Developer of an independent contractor management platform designed to empower freelancers with the financial services they need to thrive. The company's independent contractor management platform provides a payment-management system for independent contractors, offering instant payments for work performed, financial management tools and access to healthcare and retirement benefits, enabling them to manage their independent contractor workforce.
one_liner: Developer of an independent contractor management platform designed to empower freelancers with the financial services they need to thrive. The company's independent contractor management platform provides a payment-management system for independent contractors, offering instant payments for work performed, financial management tools and access to healthcare and retirement benefits, enabling them to manage their independent contractor workforce.
